name: Ardilous
description:
Hello, Agent.

Ardilous is a game in which you take the role of a Federal Agent trying to uncover international spies using cutting-edge computational technology. You must cross-reference infos between subject profiles and databases around the world to check for the truth. Ardilous is inspired by the classic Carmen San Diego Game.

Power of Ardilous

The computer codenamed ARDILOUS has access to databases all over the world. All you have to do to access them is type relevant information provided by the profiles and the computer will send information on your way.
